texto_item: 'The lesson goes around a context and the students'' background knowledge is used / built on.'
'Appropriate scaffolding (e. g. Bloom''s taxonomy) and support for tasks is provided. The challenge of the tasks is suitable to the level and learning stage.'
'The lesson includes a variety of tasks types
created_at: which are well-paced and smoothly linked.'

texto_item: 'The meaning of lexical items is appropriately conveyed (e. g. verbal and nonverbal language)
created_at: comprehension is checked. (This includes vocabulary and instructions).'

texto_item: Automatization of the language is encouraged through appropriate structured practice and communication - linguistic competence / communicative competence - tasks simulating real life are prioritized.
'Language work is not limited to sentence - level (grammar). Active
updated_at: and cooperative learning are favored over passive learning. (This includes not only an ordinary class but also homework and exam review).'

texto_item: 'There is specific focus on skills development
created_at: with emphasis placed on Speaking / Writing / Listening / Reading / Other.'

texto_item: 'Effective corrective feedback is provided (i. e. neither over-correction nor non-correction)
created_at: learning is not prevented. (Self- / Peer- / Teacher- correction are fostered).'

texto_item: 'The teacher moves around the classroom; monitoring students'' work and offering help only when asked to.'
The teacher shows good command of every single corner in the classroom giving all the students equal opportunity to participate.

TTT is reduced to the minimum; student talk dominates the class (students gain independence by means of varied interactions).
Both the teacher and students use the target language to communicate in class.

'The teacher acts as a guide fostering inductive reasoning / deductive reasoning / analysis / student''s autonomy / discussion

updated_at: additional resources) are used as tools to expand students'' language development. (The textbook is not overused).'
